text:
@EricTrump Today's date is June 21st.  

Over 122,000 Americans have died from Covid-19 (due much in part to your dad's inaction and incompetence) and it's been 55 days since the White House Coronavirus Task Force had a press briefing.

#Biden2020 
#VoteBlueToSaveAmerica
